name: Time's Ticking
description:
Controls in in-game tutorial

Time's ticking for this unfortunate alarm clock who's been sucked into a strange world. Make your way across the perilous terrain and defeat the evil hourglass who wants to destroy time itself.

Credits:
https://www.kenney.nl/ for the fonts
https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker/ for generating the sound effects
https://www.beepbox.co/ was used for making the music
